| image_caption = [[Acinetobacter baumannii]] regnum = Bacteria phylum =

| ordo_authority = Orla-Jensen, 1921 subdivision_ranks = Families subdivision =
Azotobacteraceae Branhamaceae Moraxellaceae Pseudomonadaceae }} The
'Pseudomonadales' are an order of Proteobacteria. A few members are
opportunistic pathogens, such as species of [[Pseudomonas]], [[Moraxella]], and
[[Acinetobacter]], which may cause pneumonia.
